evidence_example.title: multistack_event_demo
evidence_example.small_descr: A minimal EE demo that demonstrates how to work in MULTISTACK mode using Event, Alarms and counters.
evidence_example.long_descr: Event demo: A minimal EE demo that demonstrates how to work in MULTISTACK mode using Event, Alarms and counters. The compilation chain can start outside Eclipse environment with the "make" command inside the Debug directory of the project. The Debug directory can be created manually if you don't have the oil-based generator. The Debug directory must contain at least the following files (suitably modified...): eecfg.h, eecfg.c and the makefile (see the examples of different architectures to begin...)
